“yahapath heta dinak udesa ada dadinaya yodawamu” themawa yatathe jathyanthara tharuna dinaya nimithi karagena 12 da dawasa pura yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathyanshaya, punaruththapana ha bandhanagara prathisanskarana amathyanshaya, jathika tharuna sewa sabhawa ekwa migamuwa pallanchena elimahan sira kandawure di wadasatahan kipayak sanwidhanaya karanu labiya.yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathi dalas alahapperuma, punaruththapana ha bandhanagara prathisanskarana amathi chandrasiri gajadhira mahathwaru edina perawaruwe sita wadasatahana nimawanathuru uthsawa bhumiye randi sitima wishesha siddhiyak wiya.randawiyan, athkam peshakarmanthayehida, katayam wadu shilpayehi da yedi siti ayuru narambaamin owunge suwa duk da amathiwaru depalage wimasimata lak wiya.yauwana katayuthu amathiwaraya ge nayakathwayen saha punaruththapana katayuthu amathiwarayage nayakathwayen krikat tharagayak pawathwuni.

engalantha – ostreliya awasan test tharagayen pasuwa test kridawen samuganna bawa engalantha kridaka pol kolinwud prakasha kaleya.34 hawiridi kolinwud test kridawen wishrama giyada wissayi 20 kandayam nayakaya lesa thawaduratath katayuthu karana athara, ekdina kridaweda randi sitimata thiranaya kara atha.alubanduna test tharagamalawedi pithikaruwaku lesa asarthaka wime hethuwen me thiranayata elambai baw kolinwud pawasiya.2003 wasare shri lankawata erehiwa galledi test waram labu kolinwud test tharaga 68kata krida kara thibe.
